actual.value: The launch of the platform was expected to be held in March 2020. All member states democratic institutions (National Election Management Bodies, National Human Rights Institutions, Anti- Corruption Institutions, Ombudsman Intuitions and Judiciary are part of IGAD Governance Forum

title.narrative: Enhanced capacity of IGAD to effectively deploy and conduct preventive diplomacy and mediation
1. Number of IGAD Mediators and Technical Experts trained and readily available for deployment 2. Degree of intra and inter IGAD cooperation on mediation established and formalized through MoUs

target.value: . 100% Roster of Technical Experts trained and familiarized with IGAD Peace and Security programmes 2. Interface created and formalized between IGAD and AU on mediation and conflict resolution in the region

actual.value: IGAD MSU in consultation with 16 experts from Member States developed registration criteria, terms of engagement and structure, for establishing and managing a roster of technical experts. Based on the agreed criteria call for expression of interest was launched to identify andselect potential members of the roster of technical experts. The selection and establishment of the roster of technical experts will be finalized in the first half of 2020. AU, RECs/RMs coordination meeting was held in September 2019. AU, RECs/RMs Coordination meetings will be held biannually starting 2019 one at technical level and the other at strategic level.
